meta.job_title: Privacy and Regulatory Affairs Legal Counsel

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and update external and internal global privacy policies, processes, standards, and guidelines, on a global level, including for data lifecycle management and responsible AI
Conduct training on privacy policies and provide guidance on policy implementation and controls development
Collaborate with cross-functional and cross-regional stakeholders on privacy compliance, program, and communications
Handle privacy incidents, inquiries, and escalations

education_certification.credential: J.D. degree from ABA accredited law school (or foreign equivalent) with membership in good standing in a US state bar
Bachelor's degree in Technology or related field (preferred)
